Overlooking Säntis Mountain, a 10-minute drive from Sankt Gallen, Hotel Säntispark offers elegantly furnished rooms and free WiFi access.

The spacious, elegantly furnished rooms offer free Wi-Fi. They feature a flat-screen smart-TV.

Spa facilities at The Cambrian include an indoor pool, 2 saunas, a hot tub, and a modern gym.
